abstract: Dragan Mrđa (Serbian Cyrillic: Драган Мрђа; born 23 January 1984) is a Serbian football player who plays as striker for Serbian SuperLiga club Red Star Belgrade. In international competition he has represented Serbia.
comment: Dragan Mrđa (Serbian Cyrillic: Драган Мрђа; born 23 January 1984) is a Serbian football player who plays as striker for Serbian SuperLiga club Red Star Belgrade. In international competition he has represented Serbia.
